Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21207 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-21207 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.40-1, affected by CVE-2024-21207
